title: elo boosting
body:
i can see the player (Stephan Felix) is boosting his account by other high tier person because
he was having very low mmr and tier before but in few days he got super high mmr and  high tier now
and even have high KDA by the champion which he didnt play i want the support team to please check
about this to make all other players to play game fairy Thank You

replies.body:
Hey 1201,

Stephan Felix could have just had a string of very fortunate games, or he has just played a lot and has improved. Generally, if you play ranked quite a bit you are bound to get somewhere, but if he is being boosted if he plays ranked, he will quickly fall back to the MMR from where he came.
